summary: Following the murder of a prominent leftist, an investigator tries to uncover the truth while government officials attempt to cover up their roles.
cast: Yves Montand|Irene Papas|Jean-Louis Trintignant|François Périer|Jacques Perrin|Charles Denner|Pierre Dux|Georges Géret|Bernard Fresson|Marcel Bozzuffi|Julien Guiomar|Magali Noël|Renato Salvatori|Habib Reda|Clotilde Joano|Maurice Baquet|Sid Ahmed Agoumi|Allel El Mouhib|Hassan Hassani|Gérard Darrieu|Jean Bouise|Jean-Pierre Miquel|Van Doude|Jean Dasté|Jean-François Gobbi|Guy Mairesse|Andrée Tainsy|Eva Simonet|François Chaumette|José Artur|Nadine Barbier|Raoul Coutard|Bob de Bragelonne|Steve Gadler|Gabriel Jabbour|Georges Rouquier
title: Z
